main.name: Brandon Turner
main.description: I have been involved with software since I was 12 years old, I have been producing front end projects for clients since 2004 and full stack projects since 2011
main.bio: Seeking the position of a Full Stack Developer to further enhance organizational worth owing to my knowledge in HTML, CSS, Node.js, Github, JavaScript, Ajax, REACT.js, JSON and JQuery.
main.contactmessage: Please send me an email at me@brandonjturner.com if you have any questions or would like more information.

resume.skillmessage: I have used most technologies in respect to full stack development. I excel with Javascript, REACT.js, Node.js and MongoDB.

education.description: Keeping myself current on the latest full stack technologies was covered extensively at UCLA Extension
Great experience of higher education from Moorpark Community College.

Attended the WIT (Westlake Information Technology) Academy integegrated with the high school. The program introduced us to front end development and visual basic in 10th grade. I also learned about video editing, graphic design and Microsoft Access.

work.title: Education Specialist for the Americas
work.description: Managed education material, license servers and latest versions for schools in North/South America. Support for deploying Cinema4D in any enviornment, manage render servers on AWS, multiple cloud services and private configurations

work.title: Trading/Technology Application Systems Admin
work.description: Manage communication and prioritization of projects with multiple departments with high dollar value liaison to Software Database Employees

projects.title: Blitz Report
projects.category: Web app with authentication for Fantasy Footbal fans. Keeps track and saves QB information weekly to user profiles.

projects.title: Van Cool
projects.category: Web app with authentication to manage carpools for companies with van pooling services.

projects.title: THCatalog
projects.category: Web app I built for users to locate dispensiaries and strain information at one place.

projects.title: My Github Repos
projects.category: My latest projects that I have pushed utiizing a full stack skill set.

projects.title: Bacon Click Game
projects.category: created a memory game with React. I broke up my application's UI into components, managed component state, and responded to user events.

projects.title: Friend Finder
projects.category: Using Javascript, API Routes, and Express I created an app to match you with other users based off a survey.

projects.title: NY Times Scraper
projects.category: Using AJAX, Express, Cheerio, Mongoose, a logger and a body parser I created an app to scrape NY Times and show articles based off the query.

testimonials.text: Brandon did a seamless job creating a website for all of my creative work. I have a blog, work as a hairstylist and a photographer. The website he created is aesthetically beautiful and thoughtfully designed. He was able to manifest something that met my specific needs perfectly.
Brandon has done a fantastic job overall. Not only the site is to design, the code is very clean and slick.
